author: amecca
body:
#### PR description:
Small changes in PV validation plots with the TkAl New All-In-One tool to allow fine grained control over the axis range for d<sub>xy</sub> and d<sub>z</sub> vs. p<sub>T</sub>.

#### PR validation:
I ran the tool locally and the plots were presented at the Tracker DPG meeting.
title: PV validation range
